page.title: 15Home Life in the Cowtons
page.content: Over 90% of households in the area have a freezer or fridge-freezer. Mobile butchers and a fish merchant do visit the villages, but most people buy food in bulk. There is a bulk meat supplier in East Cowton. Microwave ovens are becoming commonplace and in E Cowton 36% of households had one. Over 50% of houses had some kind of pet animal. Dogs are by far the most common, almost 33% of houses in North Cowton having one. Horses and ponies are popular especially with young girls. Technology is coming into home life, 35% have video recorders, and now a video tape library van is based in N Cowton. 34% of households now have a computer. Unfortunately, burglaries have inc- reased in the area, many houses are having electronic alarms fitted.
